simulator.framework

Class Timer

  • java.lang.Object
    • simulator.framework.AbstractTimer
      • simulator.framework.Timer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FutureEventListener

    public class Timer
extends AbstractTimer
    Timer for simulation objects. Timer callback events are mixed in with other simulation events.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Timer(TimeSensitive handler) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void cancelEvent(FutureEvent event)
      Cancel a pending event - this method is implemented to cancel Timer events on a specific event queue.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      protected FutureEvent scheduleEvent(FutureEventListener event, SimTime timeInterval, java.lang.Object data)
      Schedule the timer event - this method is implemented to schedule the Timer on a specific event queue.

    • Method Detail

      • scheduleEvent

        protected FutureEvent scheduleEvent(FutureEventListener event,
                        SimTime timeInterval,
                        java.lang.Object data)
        Description copied from class: AbstractTimer
        Schedule the timer event - this method is implemented to schedule the Timer on a specific event queue.
        Specified by:
        scheduleEvent in class AbstractTimer
        Parameters:
        event - Event to be scheduled
        timeInterval - Amount of time in the future to schedule the event
        data - Callback data for the timerExpired callback
        Returns:
        the event object that was created. This can be used to cancel a timer event.
